subject: Re: [junit] Re: Splitting class from source
msgSnippet: This should not require any source to run. What kind of exception did you get?
messageBody:
This should not require any source to run.

What kind of exception did you get?

junitguy wrote:

>I'm using the following technique to run tests:
>public class ConverterBeanTest extends TestCase {
> public static void main(String args[]) {
> junit.textui.TestRunner.run(ConverterBeanTest.class);
> }
>}
>I want the working directory at the same level as the source, one up
>from the project root.
